recipeDescriptionLines.recipeDescriptionLine: Aloo Chat is a famous street food and is very famous in north India. It is made with fried potatoes mixed with variety of chutneys and enjoyed best with hot tea.
There are different ways to prepare Aloo Chat. Sometimes, it can be tangy or sometimes, very spicy. The texture is again as per the choice.
For healthier option, instead of fried potatoes, boiled ones are used.

ingredientList.measurementQuantity: 2 medium, each cut into small pieces

procedureSteps.stepDescription: Heat oil in kadai for frying. Make sure oil is hot. This will ensure quick frying. Once heated, add potatoes. Fry till it turns golden brown.
Remove extra oil from the fried potatoes with the help of tissue paper. Now add Chat Masala, Black Salt and red chilly powder. Mix it well. Enjoy the chat.
Here is another way to enjoy the chat. Dip ginger pieces in lemon juice, keep it aside. Add onions, green chillies, coriander leaves, mint and ginger. Mix it well. Enjoy the chat.

One of my favorite step is to heat oil in a pan. Once oil is hot, add green chilies. Fry for 30 seconds or until crisp. Add onions and fry for 2 minutes. Add coriander leaves, mint and ginger and fry for a minute.
Switch off the stove and add potatoes. Mix it well. Enjoy the chat.

tips.tipDesc: Consume it as soon as it is prepared.
